Initial post

Hi there, my name is Shunpoco. This is my first post in this blog.

Who am I?

I'm a software engineer working at Japanese IT company. My professions are machine learning and data engineering. I'm also using frontend stacks like Vue, Typescript and React.

The purpose of this blog

Write about technology especially software engineering, machine learning, data engineering and frontend stacks.
